com.bham.bd.components.triggers.effects

Class RingExplosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.components.triggers.Trigger
        • com.bham.bd.components.triggers.effects.RingExplosion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtraInfo

    public class RingExplosion
extends Trigger
    Represents Kamikaze's explosion effect. This is created as a trigger because it affects player's HP

      • RingExplosion

        public RingExplosion(Point2D centerPosition,
                     double damage,
                     Side side)
        Constructs explosion at a given location
        Parameters:
        centerPosition - x and y coordinates of the trigger image
        damage - amount of damage that will be dealt to specific side
        side - ALLY or ENEMY side trigger belongs to

        Gets the hit-box of the entity

        Hit-box is a shape with size and location properties. In most cases it is either a circle or a rectangle.

        Specified by:

      • getHitBoxRadius

        public double getHitBoxRadius()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the outer radius of the hit-box

        If it's a circle it gets its radius, if its any other shape, it gets the radius of the outer circle that would be generated around the hit-box.

        Specified by:
        getHitBoxRadius in class BaseGameEntity
        Returns:
        size of hit-box radius
